definition: to install/to fit (e.g. a light bulb)
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display

sentences.english: And don't get me started on that Liberal anti-British design for the costumes.
sentences.chinese: 别逼我开始自由的反英服装设计。

sentences.english: Therefore in the refrigerant liquid pipe must be installed before the filter drier.
sentences.chinese: 因此在冷媒供液管前必须装设干燥过滤器。

sentences.english: A curved margin of a highway was reflectorized for safety.
sentences.chinese: 为安全起见公路的弯道边上装设了反射镜。

sentences.english: If there's one thing that interests me, it's fashion design.
sentences.chinese: 如果有什么让我感兴趣的话，那就是服装设计了。

sentences.english: Favorite hobbies include archeology, archery, astrophysics, flamenco dancing, and designing clothes.
sentences.chinese: 考古，射箭，天体物理，弗拉明戈舞和服装设计。

sentences.english: I need a log design for a small hand-made costume jewellery making business.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一个小手工制作的服装设计制作业务首饰日志。

sentences.english: In the meantime, shuttle missions will focus on assembling the International Space Station.
sentences.chinese: 同时，太空梭任务将会专门用在装设国际太空站上。

sentences.english: On balance, dress designing appeals to me most.
sentences.chinese: 大体上说，我最喜欢服装设计。

sentences.english: In laymen's eyes, costume design is a beautiful work.
sentences.chinese: 在业外人士的眼里，服装设计实在是个美丽的工作。

sentences.english: Chapter two, research on the basis of style orientation of fashion design had been accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 第二章研究了服装设计的风格化定位基础。

sentences.english: Installation of the new meters will start in April 1998.
sentences.chinese: 装设新收费表的工程将于一九九八年四月展开。

sentences.english: Kim originally majored in fashion design, graduating from Seoul National University.
sentences.chinese: 金原来是主修时装设计的，毕业于汉城国立大学。

sentences.english: Typically, a distributor furnishes and installs the windows.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，配销商会提供并装设好窗户。

sentences.english: A:Which appeals more,dress designing or gardening?
sentences.chinese: 服装设计和园林设计哪个更有吸引力？

sentences.english: But some indeed do want technology in their bathrooms .
sentences.chinese: 但有些人确实希望在浴室里装设科技产品。

sentences.english: The German city of Augsburg recently installed traffic lights in the ground in front of two train stations.
sentences.chinese: 德国奥格斯堡近期在两个火车站前的地面装设红绿灯。

definition: aerial work platform (e.g. cherry picker or scissor lift)/lift/elevator
to install (water pipes, landmines etc) underground
